Html:
Hi,

I am having an Excel File which has got some cells linked to other sheets in other files.

While I am cloning the Excel Worksheet it is returning a 0 value into the cells which are getting the values from the linked cells in the other sheets in the other files.

Is there an option where I can copy only the values from the Excel Worksheet to create a worksheet having all the values.

Please reply.

Regards,
Sujauddin
